name: ArduinoValues
temp: raw A0, A0 voltage, raw A1, A1 Voltage

name: split
info:
Split comma separated string into separated messages.
Value placed to msg.payload
Value type will be still string.

There will be 4 messages out of this split node

For each msg also given a property "parts". 
It will be used later on.

name: convert
info: Convert the value of msg.payload to the number using JSONata expression.

name: route
info:
Route every message to differet output by using switch node.
As property "parts" has been given to each message, we can use its 
"index" property to find out proper output

name: string to json object
info: split comma delimted string to object attributes

name: prepend date
func:
var d = new Date();
msg.stamp = 
        d.getFullYear()
	+ '-'
	+ ('0' + (d.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2)
	+ '-'
	+ ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2)
	+ ' '
	+ ('0' + d.getHours()).slice(-2)
	+ ':'
	+ ('0' + d.getMinutes()).slice(-2)
	+ ':'
	+ ('0' + d.getSeconds()).slice(-2)
	+ '.'
	+ d.getMilliseconds()  


return msg;
